name: Naturallandscape - Three Gorges (自然景观系列-长江三峡)
description: The Natural landscape series is a virtual tourism VR game based on unreal engine developed meticulously by Magicvalley Studio, The Three Gorges of Yangtze River is the first episode of this series.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64Bit Processor: Intel I5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64Bit Processor: Intel I5 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
